item.title: How to Make a Dancing Yeti Crab Video with Music
item.description: So, I’ve been getting some questions about how one can make their own Yeti-crabs-dance-to-music video. So here’s a quick guide for the interested folk who haven’t played around with audio or video before but want to try it out. So, here’s what I did, step-by-step, in 9 easy steps. All told, this took me, eh, 5 minutes. (This is for iMovie, and I’ll link to a few tutorials in case you need them.
